participant_1.background:
I grow my own vegetables and take daily walks.
I start my day with a cup of coffee and a walk through Central Park.
i wear glasses.
I am a hard worker who is passionate about my hobbies.
I've kept my love of horror movies from my parents.

participant_2.background:
I am often in pain so I read to distract myself.
I can work all day as long as I have my coffee.
I wash my clothes weekly.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, because it helps me to stay positive and focused on raising my sons.
I'm going to visit a friend in the city this weekend.

content.text: Good morning! What are your plans for the weekend?
I'm going to visit a friend in the city this weekend. What about you?
I'm going to spend some time in Central Park. I love the fresh air and the beautiful scenery.
That sounds lovely! I'm not much of an outdoorsy person. Do you like horror movies?
I love horror movies! I keep my love of horror movies from my parents. I don't think they would approve.
That's funny! I like to read horror novels to distract myself from the pain.
I'm sorry you're in pain. I hope you feel better soon.
Thank you! I'm sure I will. Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to grow my own vegetables and take daily walks. I'm a hard worker who is passionate about my hobbies.
That's great! I love to read and I can work all day as long as I have my coffee.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, because it helps me to stay positive and focused.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm glad we met
